title: LAG?! LEAGUE OF LEGENDS ADDED A PAUSE BUTTON IN NORMAL DRAFT
body:
So we were playing and then suddenly my team and I in NORMAL DRAFT got lag from 200ms to 15k ms. All of use disconnected and then someone paused the game and then unpaused the game? when did league add a pause button?

http://imgur.com/YG335Aq

http://imgur.com/rvZUrIi

replies.body: That's really freakin' weird, d00d! Let me know if this happens again, I'd be interested to see if this is a reproducible bug or not.
